abstract: The five-year, $250 million initiative is focused on filling the skills gaps in some of the largest United States and European job markets.
snippet: The five-year, $250 million initiative is focused on filling the skills gaps in some of the largest United States and European job markets.
lead_paragraph: When Mayor Rahm Emanuel of Chicago received a call earlier this year asking if he would support a new jobs initiative from JPMorgan Chase, he replied with his typical bluntness.

headline.main: JPMorgan Plans to Unveil a Program for Job Skills
headline.print_headline: JPMorgan Plans to Unveil A Program for Job Skills

abstract: Federal authorities and JPMorgan Chase are expected to settle charges over ties to Bernard L. Madoff, who operated a billion-dollar Ponzi scheme using an account at the bank.
snippet: Federal authorities and JPMorgan Chase are expected to settle charges over ties to Bernard L. Madoff, who operated a billion-dollar Ponzi scheme using an account at the bank.
lead_paragraph: JPMorgan Chase and federal authorities are nearing settlements over the bank’s ties to Bernard L. Madoff, striking tentative deals that would involve roughly $2 billion in penalties and a rare criminal action. The government will use a sizable portion of the money to compensate Mr. Madoff’s victims.

headline.main: Criminal Action Is Expected for JPMorgan in Madoff Case
headline.print_headline: Criminal Action Is Expected For JPMorgan in Madoff Case

byline.original: By Jessica Silver-Greenberg and Ben Protess

abstract: A series of internal JPMorgan emails suggesting that employees had concerns about the bank’s ties to Bernard L. Madoff. Some of the emails surfaced in a lawsuit filed by the trustee for Mr. Madoff’s victims.
snippet: A series of internal JPMorgan emails suggesting that employees had concerns about the bank’s ties to Bernard L. Madoff. Some of the emails surfaced in a lawsuit filed by the trustee for Mr. Madoff’s victims.
lead_paragraph: A series of internal JPMorgan emails suggesting that employees had concerns about the bank’s ties to Bernard L. Madoff. Some of the emails surfaced in a lawsuit filed by the trustee for Mr. Madoff’s victims.

abstract: JPMorgan Chase is nearing settlements over its ties to Bernard L. Madoff. | Hilton Worldwide is set to have its stock market debut. | A skeptical view of the Treasury secretary’s reassurances on “too big to fail.” | Facebook is joining the Standard & Poor’s 500-stock index.
snippet: JPMorgan Chase is nearing settlements over its ties to Bernard L. Madoff. | Hilton Worldwide is set to have its stock market debut. | A skeptical view of the Treasury secretary’s reassurances on “too big to fail.” | Facebook is joining the Standar...
lead_paragraph: JPMorgan Chase is nearing settlements with federal authorities over its ties to Bernard L. Madoff, reaching tentative deals that would involve roughly $2 billion in penalties and a rare criminal action, Jessica Silver-Greenberg and Ben Protess report in DealBook. The government plans to use a sizable portion of the money to compensate Mr. Madoff’s victims, according to DealBook.

headline.main: JPMorgan Nears Settlement in Madoff Case
